official_title: A bill to authorize the flood control project on Fourche Bayou in Saline and Pulaski Counties, Arkansas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a certain flood control project on the Fourche Bayou in Saline and Pulaski Counties, Arkansas.
